msbt.message: How do you do, ?
Dearest ,
Why hello, !
My dear ,
I was over the moon when I opened my mailbox and saw your letter!
My heart skipped a beat when I got your postcard in the mail, darling.
I read and reread the letter you composed for me. It was so lovely!
The letter you sent me was so full of your unique personality, darling!
It was such a pleasure to read your note as I sipped a cup of tea.
And it's such a joy to think about the wonder that is you as I sit here and compose this note in return.
And writing this postcard to you is the perfect opportunity to think back on all the things we've done.
And you know, lying in bed and penning this note to you is the perfect way to end my day.
Writing a good letter can be hard. I wish I had your way with words. You make it seem so easy!
I've been under the weather, but while I composed this reply, I forgot all my aches and pains!
I do love letters. Write again soon!
Write me again, anytime you want.
I've greatly enjoyed this exchange.
Oh dear, I'm out of space already.
I am and always will be your friend.
Sincerely yours,
Yours,
With love,
With warm regards,
Ta-ta for now,
